title: Des Bannon
text:
Desmond Patrick Bannon (19 April 1923 – 24 July 2000) was a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who represented <a href="Australia">Australia</a>.
Bannon, a <a href="fly-half%20%28rugby%20union%29">fly-half</a>, was born in <a href="Haberfield%2C%20New%20South%20Wales">Haberfield, New South Wales</a> and claimed 1 international rugby cap for Australia.
